column5: Do they still operate a mechanical portage between Pelican Lake and Lac Seul just outside of Sioux Lookout? Can you run the rapids between Pelican and Lac Seul?

I have run the rapids between the 2 lakes on several ocassions. Wide open throttle and stay in the center of the channel. You should be ok. If you are going downstream, take a sharp left when you get over the falls.
When the water is high like now the trailer thing is not working.
